title: The new super galaxy skins don't really fit the theme
body:
Fizz might as well have been Mecha Fizz, and Kindred and Shyv could have just been Neon Strike

The theme of Super Galaxy was over the top space opera and these seem like basic sci fi skins which we already have the overall theme of in other categories.

They're Ok skins, but they should be categorized differently.

Also the color theme just doesn't fit at all either.

EDIT: Adding pictures for comparison

http://static.eclypsia.com/public/upload/cke/LoL%20-%20Splash/Vi_NeonStrike_Splash.jpg
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/ChjSu1CUUAAY6xH.jpg:large
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/kderuRbEyv0/maxresdefault.jpg


Which feels like it fits more?
